transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Namaskar sir.

Customer: Namaskar.

Executive: Kaise hain sir? IndiaMART se aapki baat Swatantra Kishore ji ho rahi hai.

Customer: Badhiya hai.

Executive: Sir aapne jo mujhe wo share kiya tha na photos share kar diye the and all share kara tha to maine wo check kiya abhi just now main check hi kar raha tha to wo jo hai ab hamari enterprises hai wo hamare end pe sir unka GST mentioned hai magar wo jo hai particularly wo unki service abhi run nahi ho rahi hai right now.

Executive: Theek hai sir.

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: To service unki run ho nahi rahi hai baki maine ye information maine jaise aapko bola tha backend mein ke liye to maine backend mein bhi wo pahuncha di hai to usme bhi hum logo ke end pe jo bhi possible ho payega wo hum karne ki koshish karenge.

Executive: Theek hai sir. To usse aap ekdam nishchint rahiyega jo aapne information di hai wo maine mention kar di hai usme jo jo aapne images share kari thi na.

Customer: Wo to provide ho gaya na.

Executive: Haan wo maine provide kar diya hai to us pe wo check jo rahenge wo check kar liya jayega uske according mention kar diya jayega.

Executive: Theek hai sir iske aapne jo aapne jo diya hai wo bhi sir dekhenge and sir main thoda ye janna chah raha tha ki sir aap apni availability confirm karaiye na phir sir aap us din hamari baat nahi ho rahi thi sir ki video meet pe connect hote hain and catalog score pe work karne ke liye sir.

Customer: Chalo aaj sir aata hu aapko.

Executive: Haan catalog pe bataiye aap time dijiye hum baithte hain catalog pe work karna shuru karte hain kyunki abhi right now aapka catalog 61% run ho raha hai sir to catalog better karna shuru karte hain jisse ki aapki inquiries and calls mein thodi wo help ho.

Customer: Chalega chalega main aapko aaj jo hai na leke aaunga.

Executive: Haan theek hai sir.

Customer: Abhi din mein jab aap thoda bahut point kar dena jo bhi rahega.

Executive: Haan aap available time aap mujhe ek bar confirm kar dijiyega ki ye time hai and uske according hum karenge message kar dijiyega agar mera in case agar ek bar call pick na ho na sir to aap mere ko ek bar whatsapp pe message kar dijiyega theek hai to jaise hi available main hounga main wo turant check karke wo aapko main confirmation uski main jisse ki na provide kar sakta hu.

Customer: Chalega.

Executive: Theek hai sir and baki jo iske liye tha and jo aap mujhe aapne jo bataya tha kya kehte hain ye fraud ke liye uske liye to maine wo sare sir check kar liye hain unki GST aapne mujhe batai thi wo GST maine wo dekh li hai wo bhi unki hai sir GST to hai unka but IndiaMART pe agar main working ki baat karu to unka IndiaMART pe working jo hai wo nahi hai sir wo basically IndiaMART pe wo abhi use nahi kar rahe hain wo koi kisi prakar ki wo buylead purchase nahi kar sakte hain na calls na inquiry to ye sab wo check nahi kar sakte hain.

Customer: [inaudible]

Executive: To unka data haan ekdam as an freezy hai to wo abhi to use nahi kar sakte hain baki aapke end pe jo share kiye gaye the usko maine sir bheja hua hai to jisse ki hamari team hai wo check kar sake aur backend se aur jitni hum main help le sakta hu utni main help lene ki koshish karta hu sir ki is pe hum main work kar saku and jo hai sir galat hai us pe to dekhiye rehna chahiye.

Customer: Mujhe mujhe nahi do teen log ko aur target kiya tha.

Executive: Haan.

Customer: Mere market mere market mein khabar aaya tha do teen log ko aur target kiya tha to aisa bahut logo ko pareshan karega wo request hai usko block kar dijiye.

Executive: Achcha.

Executive: Aapko aap baki sab se bhi information aayi thi kya?

Customer: Baki bhi aane wale hain.

Customer: Baki bhi pehchan wale hain ye bata rahe the mere se bhi aaya tha aisa.

Executive: Achcha.

Customer: Haan wahi team ka aaya tha.

Executive: Team ka ye amar walon ka hi aaya hua hai.

Customer: Haan haan uska hi team aaya tha.

Executive: Unko bhi aise hi fraud kar raha tha wo to bas wo bhi bach gaye aisa nahi wo de diye bole usko payment mang raha tha payment kiya hi nahi usne.

Customer: Haan.

Customer: Wo aisa de diye isliye fraud wala aur to usko nikal ke bahar dikha dijiye shayad ye company mein aa sake.

Executive: Correct correct correct main wahi maine isliye hi maine jaise hi main sabse pehle morning mein aaya na to sir aapke hi kaam pe maine wo kiya ki main aapke work pe baitha aur wo main data beta pura check karke phir use confirm karke maine kaha ki aapko ek bar main guide kar du bata du aapko kya kya hua hai and jo real person hai usi ko rakhiye baki ko sab bahar kar dijiye.

Executive: Haan sir haan magar agar aise koi agar koi nazar aate hain to sir us pe to hum definitely work karna chahenge. Thank you sir aapne jo information di thi uske liye to bilkul thank you sir aapne jo images share kari hai wo main upload marta hu yahan par and baki sir aap catalog ke liye and
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer reports fraudulent activity targeting others.

- Customer wants to block the fraudster.

- Catalog is running at 61%.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the GST details of fraudster.

- Executive confirmed fraudster not actively using IndiaMART.

- Executive assured customer that action will be taken.

- Executive will upload the shared images.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will confirm availability for catalog work.

- Customer will message executive on WhatsApp if needed.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- fraud, catalog, gst, buyleads, working
